message: Hello! Welcome back to VoyageQuest. I see you’ve been in touch with us regarding your refund request. How can I assist you today?
Hi. I've been waiting for an update on my refund for the cancellation fees. I was told I'd get a response days ago, but nothing yet.
I sincerely apologize for the delay. I completely understand how important this is to you. Let me check the latest status of your refund request for the cancellation fees right away.
This is really frustrating. I’ve had to follow up multiple times, and I still don’t have any answers. I need my money back!

I completely understand your frustration, and I appreciate your patience. I can see your refund request for the cancellation fees is still being processed, but I will escalate it to ensure it is prioritized.
You said that last time. I just want to know when I’ll get my refund.

I completely understand. Based on my review, the refund for your cancellation fees should be processed within the next 3-5 business days. I will personally monitor the progress and update you as soon as it's completed.
Alright, but I really hope this time it actually happens. I can't keep chasing this.
I truly appreciate your patience. Rest assured, I will make sure this is resolved. Please feel free to reach out if you need any further assistance.
